name: Pathak Machines
overview:
Year of Establishment 1978, Our company introduces itself as a major manufacturer, exporter, trader and supplier of Plant Machinery.

Our Products: Pillar Type Power Press Treadle Shearing Machine Press Brake Machine Plate Bending Machine Guillotine Shearing Machine Crank Shearing Machine Hand Operated Hydraulic Press Power Operated Hydraulic Press Rolling Shutter Machine C Type Power Press

Our Infrastructure: Our state-of-the-art infrastructure has manufacturing unit that are equipped with modern machinery, which assists us in producing our products by automatic and semi-automatic techniques. Our manufacturing unit is located at Ludhiana.

Our Team: We are supported by a team of highly experienced professionals, who enable us in meeting the exact demands of clients. Our team comprises engineers, technicians, designers, production personnel and others, who cordially perform all business operations to accomplish set targets.

Vender Base: To offer our clients with best quality products, we manufacture them using high grade raw material that we procure from authorized vendors of industry. We have selected them on the basis of their industrial knowledge and experience
